  Bob - 

  Sugiyama does not handle things anymore, at least no=
t directly. I've always used Bob Benson as agent but understand Robert Hugh=
s also does this service. I'm sure there are others that people use, too. 
=

  As for shinsa results, of course a fully polished sword will allow for a=
 more reliable judgement by the team, but a sword just a little out of full=
 polish would probably work okay. The judges have to be able to see and rea=
d the sword's characteristics, so if that is mostly hidden, well, they can'=
t see behind what's hidden. If there is a signature, I guess they would pap=
er it based on that, but I'd say condition needs to be reasonably good. 

 =
 Ron

  STL
